original_definition: 'gas supply contract' means a contract for the supply of natural gas, but does not include a gas derivative;
generated_definition: 'gas supply contract' means a legally binding agreement between a natural gas producer and a natural gas consumer, defining the terms and conditions for the supply of natural gas over a specified period of time and at a specified price.

Article\u00a02: ‘emergent market’ means a Member State in which the first commercialsupplyof its first long-term naturalgas supply contract was made not more than 10 years earlier;
